EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2014 - 2014.09.18.Invite 7
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Accelerate 2014 - Are you agile enough to register late?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate>
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 September 18, 2014 Hotel Intercontinental Vienna Full-day Event
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-accelerate-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
Tricentis Accelerate 2014
Dear Tricentis Customers and Partners,
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 is almost here! Being agile also means adapting to new requirements. Are you agile enough to register late? The field of software testing is rapidly changing and the Tricentis Accelerate 2014 is your ticket to the future: Agile or not - Register now <http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-accelerate-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>!
We'll have break-out sessions and exhibition booths featuring testing experts from around the world. Exciting topics from this year's Accelerate include:
- Optimize – Risk Coverage - Virtualize – Systems & Services - Automate – Model-Based Test Automation - Agile Testing
- Mobile Testing
So register and be sure to mark your calendar for September 18th!
Register now <http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-accelerate-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>.
For the event agenda and more info, visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate>
Best Regards,
Wolfgang Platz
Founder & Chief Product Officer
Tricentis
Franz Fuchsberger
Co-Founder & Chief Sales Officer
Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
